name: GetUsDrunk
description:
Are you drinking with your friends, but you want to make it more fun? Well, then this app is for you!

Based on a classic drinking game King's Cup. But there are more ways to get drunk and its basically endless. So the game really ends when you've had enough!

Simple UI

There are no useless menus and buttons. Just tap the screen and follow the instructions!

At the moment there are two languages available: English end Czech
